name: July meetup
description:
Playing with WebRTC


WebRTC is useful tech... but who cares about useful? Let's do something fun!

Let's take a look at WebRTC. It will be weird. Hopefully it will be fun. You might even learn something.

Mark Goodwin is a security expert for Mozilla


Bring a laptop, we will have a hacking session.


After

Afterwards we go round the corner to the Keans Head for more JavaScript socialising.

Contact

Ask questions or to talk to our friendly community at:

https://gitter.im/nottsjs/discuss

Find us on twitter: 

@nottsjs
